name: mm-datepicker
description: A single and dual (range) date/time picker component including numeric and calendar based inputs

attributes.name: useTimeZone
attributes.description: Enables timezone dropdown when true (requires external tz data)

attributes.name: useRange
attributes.description: Enables date range dropdown for preselected ranges

attributes.name: useTime
attributes.description: Enables input boxes for time selection

attributes.name: useCommit
attributes.description: Shows a footer which contains save/close buttons. Without pressing save the data is not persisted to the start/end binds

attributes.name: resetOnClose
attributes.description: When useCommit is true and resetOnClose is true, the picker will be reset to default values when closed if a user does not press the save button

attributes.name: dual
attributes.description: When true, the datepicker shows a start and end date panel for ranges

attributes.name: dateFormat
attributes.description: moment.js format string used for date formatting--note that the input mask needs to be edited independently for format changes

attributes.name: timeFormat
attributes.description: moment.js format string used for time formatting--note that markup currently only supports 12 hour time with a fixed dropdown.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the selected date either to the start/end value or to the values specified in arguments

arguments.name: start
arguments.description: A date object representing the start date (and time) to reset the picker instance to.

arguments.name: end
arguments.description: A date object representing the end date (and time) to reset the picker instance to.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Behaves simliarly to close, excecpt that any pending values are commited (when

properties.name: rangeValue
properties.description: The currently selected range value for preset ranges

properties.name: rangePresets
properties.description: An array of objects which should contain a name, start and end property. Name is a string representing the preset's label. start and end should be JS Date objects that specify a valid start and end range to be selected.

properties.name: rangeDescription
properties.description: A string used for the range dropdown's default text

properties.name: timezoneDescription
properties.description: A string used for the timezone dropdown's default text

properties.name: timezones
properties.description: An array of objects each with a label and value property. Label is displayed in the dropdown and when present value is used for the timezone property exposed on the component.

properties.name: start
properties.description: In dual configuration this is the selected start date. In single configuration this is the only date available.

properties.name: startEnabled
properties.description: Default value for the enable/disable checkbox which appears when startEnabledLabel is specified

properties.name: startUserEnableable
properties.description: Determines if the user is able to control the start enabled checkbox state.

properties.name: startEnabledLabel
properties.description: A label used for the start checkbox. Typically this is used for scenarios where there is a 'parent' date that the picker must constrain to

properties.name: startLabel
properties.description: The label for the lefthand section of the picker when in dual mode. Typically this is the start date.

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: A string in the dateformat used for the default

properties.name: startTime
properties.description: A date object representing the default time to use in the time input.

properties.name: startTimePeriod
properties.description: The meridian value to default the meridian dropdown to

properties.name: end
properties.description: In dual configuration this is the selected end date. In single configuration this is the only date available.

properties.name: endEnabled
properties.description: Default value for the enable/disable checkbox which appears when endEnabledLabel is specified

properties.name: endUserEnabled
properties.description: Determines if the user is able to control the end enabled checkbox state.

properties.name: endEnabledLabel
properties.description: A label used for the end checkbox. Typically this is used for scenarios where there is a 'parent' date that the picker must constrain to

properties.name: endLabel
properties.description: The label for the lefthand section of the picker when in dual mode. Typically this is the end date.

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: A string in the dateformat used for the default

properties.name: endTime
properties.description: A date object representing the default time to use in the time input.

properties.name: endTimePeriod
properties.description: The meridian value to default the meridian dropdown to

detail.name: start
detail.description: Start date the user has chosen

detail.name: end
detail.description: End date the user has chosen
